cboCostEstimates.description: As posted on the House Rules Committee website on March 8, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 1620, the Violence Against Women Reauthorization Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 43 (Monday, March 8, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. JACKSON LEE:
H.R. 1620.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
This bill is enacted pursuant to the power granted to
Congress under Article I, Section 8, Clauses 3 and 18 of the
United States Constitution.
[Page H1121]

latestAction.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

title: Violence Against Women Act Reauthorization Act of 2021
